Text: By the way, it might not work so well on a lot of computers, unless you know what VLC settings to play with. I played this on my WDTV Live and it looks beautiful.

Great job nomad! There are some visible artifacts here and there, but that's to be expected using the Avisynth script.

WARNING: There are 4 audio streams, 2 English, 2 French. The default is the English-stereo, which breaks after 2:03. Don't freak out, use the 5.1 English audio stream from the start, works like a charm.
Rorschach's mask really freaked my wife out in 60fps.
